subtitles:
33051 36349 [ Girl ] People once believed
that when someone dies...

36414 40541 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

43907 48962 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

52042 56835 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

108882 113228 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

113302 116435 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

119866 123666 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

125983 129083 Devil's fuckin' Night.
What's the count so far?

130530 133249 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

133316 137989 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

140841 144040 [ Man ] You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

144108 148716 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

148783 150988 - ls this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

151057 153808 - We found her, and you missed it.
- l don't care what her name is.

153875 156365 l didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

156437 159756 l can see why they took away
your gold shield.

159831 162736 Yeah, l wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

170623 174652 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

174722 176862 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

176932 180710 Look, l will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

193104 196968 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

197042 200176 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
206361 208502 You lied to her about Eric.

210171 213752 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

224742 230236 Now, come on.
Come on. lt's okay.

251787 255652 [ Sarah ] A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

255726 258510 l used to think that was true
about everything...

262868 266645 But now l know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

266710 270903 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

307602 310670 What are you,
like the night watchman?

331139 334371 You know, what this place
needs is a...

336775 341001 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

341066 343937 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
344012 346218 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
346286 349223 Hey, hey, let me do it.

349297 353161 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

353235 355571 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

355637 357493 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.

366909 370588 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

370655 374433 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

376292 379840 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

379910 383011 - They make you fart big time.
- [ Chuckling ]

389069 391689 [ Man ] You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

391759 394281 from all the crap
floating around in it.

395410 398991 l wish l could have seen that.
[ Whistling ]

498716 502493 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

524527 527791 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

534742 537232 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

544958 547512 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.

547583 550750 - Mickey, call it in for me!
- [ Woman Shouting ]

662323 666734 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely.''
lt's pornography.

676348 679285 - [ Shelly ] No! Eric!
- [ Man ] See ya!

727833 730650 - Hey, that's good.
- [ Man ] That's good.

734366 737816 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

741027 745285 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

748808 750719 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

753836 757384 Are you out of
your motherfuckin' mind, man?

781184 785311 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

785379 789124 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

789190 792159 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
792232 794918 Fire it up! Fire it up!

798028 799939 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doin'?

833894 837246 - l love you.
- Say that again.

850450 853518 - [ Sarah ] Wow, you look great.
- [ Shelly ] Ta-da!

860281 862738 - Come here! [ Laughing ]
- No, no, no!
907643 911061 * lt doesn't matter how you hide *
911134 914333 * We find you if we're wanting to *

916610 920290 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

920357 924386 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *

959425 963290 24k, huh? lt's 18k.
lt's crap. lt's probably fake.
965669 970015 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

974508 977063 l'll give you 50 bucks.
And l hate charities.

977134 979853 Now, you,
take it or leave it.

988342 991377 - You cheap ass, chrome dome...
- [ Siren Wailing ]

994394 996664 Close the gate
when you go out!

996732 999286 Oh, l close this up
for you real good, massa.

1001856 1005153 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1009669 1013949 Lucky l didn't stab
your fat ass.
1034007 1038582 * That point me to another day *

1114737 1117772 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?

1167967 1170522 l ain't murdered nobody, man!
l don't even fucking know you!

1170593 1174524 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- l want you to tell me a story.

1174596 1177860 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1177927 1180384 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1180456 1185129 l'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1185196 1189934 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1195379 1200948 Shelly, yeah, yeah. l shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1209821 1214527 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. lt's fun!

1214593 1219037 lt's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1223560 1226017 l'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1260867 1266501 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *

1274092 1278219 - Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
- lt's a mess.
1283219 1285228 * No, they don't have to take you *

1285301 1287953 l got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1288023 1292434 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1292505 1295704 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1296765 1298621 Give me some of that
over there!

1300768 1304316 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1304386 1308961 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1309029 1312709 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? lt's tragic.

1312776 1316805 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1316875 1320773 - ls the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1361996 1366472 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.

1402729 1408614 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1414995 1418030 [ Man ] Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!

1435874 1441180 - [ Clearing Throat ]
- l told you to stay out of here.

1441253 1444768 So l guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1444839 1448704 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?

1454383 1457254 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1462709 1466257 - ''Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.''
- [ Laughing ]
1480674 1483010 Who the fuck is this now?

1489768 1493448 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1500752 1504846 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1512184 1516377 ''Suddenly l heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1516443 1520221 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door.''

1527075 1531039 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1533352 1536223 l'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1566687 1571776 l repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1573349 1576668 lt was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1579273 1582789 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.

1589873 1592722 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1592786 1595723 l think you can rule out
accidental death.

1595797 1598482 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1598550 1602547 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1602618 1607160 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1607229 1609085 l'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1609151 1612765 Word to the wise:
Watch your fuckin' mouth.

1613922 1616225 What the hell
do you call that?

1619814 1623429 l suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1623497 1626150 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1635475 1637997 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1638069 1640854 Okay, the rings!
l'll tell you about the rings!

1640919 1645145 They're in that metal box!
lt's under the shelf there!

1645211 1650517 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1653953 1656443 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1672622 1676683 Oh, it's beautiful.
l don't believe it.

1699586 1702402 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1705510 1708262 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1708328 1710850 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1710922 1713225 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1713292 1718183 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1724884 1727537 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1727606 1730161 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1731769 1735033 Each one of these is a life...

1743778 1747774 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1756075 1760104 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1761935 1765832 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1765905 1769388 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!

1792869 1796188 lt's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.

1803084 1807365 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1821658 1825436 l am the police and l say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1825501 1830458 And l say l'm dead and l move.

1833762 1837955 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1838022 1841024 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1842825 1845893 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1845963 1849796 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?

1852496 1856907 l want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1856979 1861619 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1861687 1865967 - lt's gettin' too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1866042 1868378 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1868444 1872855 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1872927 1875417 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1875489 1878840 - [ Looter ] Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1878915 1884069 - [ Glass Shattering ]
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1884135 1887650 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

1893198 1896462 - [ Woman Laughing ]
- [ Looter ] Leave it, run!

1905847 1908336 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1908408 1910647 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1910715 1916316 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. l hate that.

1924356 1927457 Just wish l was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1927526 1931588 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, l may get it, l know.

1966338 1970138 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1970213 1973314 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1973383 1975075 l didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1977770 1980969 l got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1981037 1983243 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1983311 1987689 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1987762 1990219 Gentlemen, by all means,
l think we ought to have...

1990292 1993360 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

1995928 1998385 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

1998457 2001143 - Whatever you say, l can do.
- Good.

2003965 2007830 l still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2007904 2012185 ls that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2012259 2014049 Call it my need to know.

2053730 2056896 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2060615 2064742 He was a buttface.
l could have made it.

2064810 2067746 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2071727 2076269 lt's more like surfing than skating.
l wish the rain would stop, just once.

2077395 2080746 - lt can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2097007 2101418 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2101490 2105649 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2109079 2113141 ''We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--''

2115260 2118012 Big ''kick me'' sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2118078 2122009 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2122081 2127748 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2127813 2131231 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2131304 2135136 - l know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- l bet he does.

2141872 2145452 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2147636 2152178 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.

2186992 2190540 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.

2214404 2216926 - There's a big fuckin' bird over there.
- * No more **

2253696 2258042 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!

2264649 2267553 lt's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2275152 2279792 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2281716 2286455 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2310056 2312677 Stop me if you heard this one.

2320753 2323405 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2326965 2329105 ''Can you put me up for the night?''

2334394 2338805 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2340927 2344858 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2368115 2370003 l've got a gun
in my pocket.

2372918 2375538 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2407567 2411880 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2411954 2416529 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2426521 2431129 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2459697 2463213 lf l wanted ice,
l would have asked for ice!
2466518 2469750 Fill it up yourself, macho man.

2484483 2486973 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2487045 2489414 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2489479 2492296 This is a first.
Do l bow or do l curtsy?

2492361 2495046 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.

2503601 2507149 - You stay put right there.
- [ Groaning ]

2548114 2553617 [ Man On Radio ] As you can see, l'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2553685 2556305 - [ Door Squeaking ]
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2556375 2559247 lt was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2559322 2562138 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2562204 2564278 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2564350 2566391 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2566463 2571038 ln fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2573988 2577340 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2583371 2586919 l saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2586990 2589163 You still have your hat on.
2604378 2608505 are you some kind of... ghost?

2617732 2622110 l don't know what l am. l need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2624040 2627938 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2628011 2630980 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2631053 2635464 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.

2638130 2642323 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2642390 2645458 Her body finally just gave it up.

2645528 2649240 l saw it.
l couldn't do jack for her.

2676014 2678023 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2678095 2683337 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2683411 2687954 l was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2688023 2690840 Give me something
l could work with.

2695516 2697906 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2697982 2701181 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2701248 2704567 would talk after
what happened to you?

2707813 2710368 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.

2716171 2720484 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2725170 2729002 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2729077 2732428 l used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2744640 2748920 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2753414 2756482 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2759978 2762566 l thought l'd use
your front door.

2765487 2771088 Look, man, l'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2781722 2785107 [ Gideon ] l got stabbed!
l shot the son of a bitch!

2785181 2788183 l watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2788255 2791192 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2791265 2794366 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2794435 2796859 l saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2796934 2801192 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2806156 2808524 - What else did you see?
- So far l haven't heard...

2808590 2810980 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2811055 2816362 What do l get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.

2819157 2824049 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!

2831038 2833374 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2833440 2835351 What're you tellin' me,
this thing is real?

2835425 2838940 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2839011 2842811 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2842887 2846850 You're directly out of
your fucking mind! You know that!

2849547 2854504 Eyes see. lt's one of the most important
things l learned from my sister.

2854575 2857709 Sister? She's supposed to be
your sister? [ Laughing ]

2861044 2864112 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?

2864182 2866355 Now, let's take it
from the top, friend.

2866423 2869778 With a lot of detail.
What do you say?

2869905 2873224 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

2873300 2876564 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.

2878840 2882455 Draven. He said his name
was Eric Draven.

2885565 2890041 This bird man, he just happened
to let you live, huh?

2890112 2894305 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
2894372 2896959 l ain't makin' all this up.

2897029 2901375 l ain't twisted
like you two fucks.

2909583 2914408 A boy and his bird.
Awful touching.

2924249 2927121 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.

2936065 2938271 Funboy said he saw
a black bird too.

2940901 2945574 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.

2945641 2949418 l'll have the janitor
come on up.
3018204 3020060 * lt can't rain all the time *

3020126 3024471 [ Skipping ]
* Can't rain all the time *

3033192 3035779 [ T-bird ] l don't know how many times l
gotta tell you. We're in this together!
3035849 3038666 One part falls, it all falls!

3038731 3042050 - You know how long it took us
to put this together?
- Yeah, a long time.

3042126 3044583 That piece of ratshit made Tin Tin
into a fuckin' voodoo doll!

3049684 3053713 Fire it up! Fire it up!
Fire it up! Fire it up!

3103514 3106932 What the fuck are
you supposed to be, man?

3134064 3137198 - Oh, shit!
- What the fuck's the matter with you?

3147802 3152060 What do you want, man?
Money? Drugs? l got it.

3153599 3156383 We could use you.
You did Tin Tin.

3156448 3159418 - This is business, right?
- [ Gun Cocks ] Faster.

3166344 3168648 l hate this.
They can't even call it cream legally.

3170187 3173036 - What in the crap--
- [ Tires Screech, Siren Wails ]

3179185 3181773 When they flash us like that,
they ain't friends.

3187127 3189999 This is Vehicle 48. We got us
a big, old, red hot rod.

3195773 3198426 You got something personal, amigo,
we can work it out.

3217261 3219401 Oh, my God!
Get outta the way!

3230038 3234132 - [ Engine Rattling ]
- Holy shit! Goddamn foreign cars!

3246882 3250430 Oh, l hate this.
This ain't good.

3272629 3275730 But l don't know what--
What? Huh? What?

3275799 3278452 What are you talkin' about?
No, no, no, no, no.

3278521 3281490 You mean that place downtown?
Yeah, l remember her.

3281563 3283637 We needed to put some fear
into that little lady.

3283708 3286842 She wasn't going along
with our tenant relocation program.

3286911 3290361 And her idiot boyfriend shows up
and turns a simple sweep-and-clear...

3290433 3293731 into a total cluster fuck!
Who gives a shit?

3293796 3296930 lt's ancient history!
Why? What do you want?

3296999 3301704 What is it? What?
Speak to me. Speak!

3312274 3317263 l know you. l know you.
l knew l knew you.

3317333 3321259 l knew l knew you.
But you ain't you.

3321386 3325186 You can't be you. We put you through
the window. There ain't no coming back.

3325262 3328559 This is the really real world.
There ain't no coming back.

3328624 3330895 We killed you dead.
There ain't no coming back.

3335317 3338166 There ain't no coming back!
There ain't no coming back!
3347998 3350815 and felt how awful goodness is.''

3417968 3420174 [ Woman ] This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3420242 3422480 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3422548 3426741 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, ''Devil's Night''...

3426807 3430104 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3430169 3435323 Last year over 200 blazes were reported,
and 11 people lost their lives.

3435389 3440346 Tonight may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3440417 3443899 The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties--

3443971 3447618 Do you like them up or over?
l can't remember.

3449575 3452195 What are you doing?
l don't even like eggs.

3452265 3457004 - Wait, you loved eggs.
- Yeah, when l was five.

3457069 3461033 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3461104 3464302 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3464371 3469262 Oh, it wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3474938 3479961 You're acting weird. Did you win
the lottery or something, Darla?

3482368 3486494 Oh, forget it. l never was
too good at this mommy shit.

3510163 3512980 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3513045 3516179 We just fished this out of the river.
He's fused to his own car.

3516248 3520310 - We're gonna have to l.D. his teeth.
- His name is T-bird.

3522300 3524189 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3535846 3539231 l got a goddamn vigilante killer
knocking off scumbags left and right...

3542506 3544842 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3544909 3548654 - You're the detective. You tell me.
- Okay.

3548719 3550760 Gideon's blows all to hell and you're
having a chitchat with some weirdo...

3550833 3553585 who winds up in T-bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3553651 3556500 Then you steal one of
my case files from homicide...

3556565 3558421 and you're saying this is
just a fuckin' automobile accident?

3558486 3560691 - Come on!
- Yeah. Good speech though.

3560760 3562703 l didn't want to interrupt you.
lt sounded good.
3562777 3564666 You gotta write that shit down.

3566652 3569589 The captain's got a little
love note waiting for you.

3569662 3573440 - Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
- Suspension?

3577156 3581021 [ Dials Phone ]
Yeah, give me the lab.

3629706 3632196 [ Shelly ] One for sorrow,
two for joy...

3632268 3634986 - Come here.
- ...three for a girl, four for a boy.

3729170 3732784 You said,
''Can't rain all the time.''
3732852 3735986 That is from your song, right?
